station

Class PickerAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • jade.core.Agent
      • station.PickerAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jade.core.TimerListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class PickerAgent
extends jade.core.Agent
    Picker agent which is in charge of the dynamic between the OrderAgent, the RobotAgent and the ShelfAgent. It picks an order, broadcasts the needed parts to the shelves and picks the robot nearest to a chosen shelf; it then commands the robot to fetch the shelf.

    Attributes:

    • activeAgent: array of IDs which store found free RobotAgent.
    • printer: utility to implement colored messages.
    • position: an instance of the class Pose with the picker position.
    • busy: status of the picker agent.

    Author:
    [DNA] Diego, Nicolas, Argentina
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      This agent will query for RobotAgent which are registered to the DF, description facilitator, and are offering the service of "fetch".
